name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: TextFlip: ChatGPT Rewriter, AI Humanizer, Chat PDF and Summarizer

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Powerful Chrome extension offering text rewriting, humanizing, PDF processing, and summarization features.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🔥 Rewrite any ChatGPT text to avoid AI detectors with TextFlip.ai

In today’s fast-paced digital landscape, staying ahead in content creation is key. That’s where we come in.

Why Choose Us?

👉  Faster Content Creation: Our AI tool generates high-quality material swiftly, keeping your content fresh and engaging.
👉  Humanization Feature: Our unique text humanization technology ensures your content resonates with your audience on a deeper level.
👉  Effortless PDF Interaction: Dive into our intuitive chat feature for PDF documents, making your interaction seamless and efficient.
👉  Powerful PDF Summarizer: Our PDF summarizer tool saves you time and enhances your understanding of complex materials.

Embrace the power of AI and take your content creation to the next level. Explore our tools today and discover how we can transform your content strategy for the better.


Optimize your workflow and enhance your interaction with textual content with our multifunctional Chrome extension. This all-in-one tool is designed for professionals, students, and anyone dealing with a large volume of information. With our extension, you can:

👉  Rewrite text: Enhance the uniqueness and quality of your texts with advanced rewriting algorithms.
👉  Humanize content: Add a "human touch" to your texts, making them more natural and appealing to readers.
👉  Chat with PDFs: Convert PDF document content into an editable format for further editing or analysis.
👉  Summarize PDF documents: Get concise summaries of lengthy documents, saving your time and focusing on key points.


🔥 TextFlip is your all-in-one GPT AI assistant. 

💻 How to use:
🔸Click the "Add to Chrome" button and pin it to the toolbar.
🔸Log in to your account.
🔸Select the option that you need.
🔸Start working with AI!


The extension is intuitive to use and integrates directly into your browser, providing instant access to powerful text processing tools. Improve your productivity and content quality today!


❓ Frequently Asked Questions:

📌 Do I need a ChatGPT/OpenAI account?
- No, you do not need to have a ChatGPT account to use this extension. You can create a free account at TextFlip.

📌 ChatGPT is banned in my country. Does it work in my country?
- Yes. Our extension works in all countries.

📌Is it free to use?
- Yes, we offer limited use for free. For unlimited access, you can choose the Premium Plan.
